materials.raw_text: Hg: 10 g, Mg: 30 g, Pb: 20 g, Tm: 30 g

sourcing.instructions: Hg: Specialty chemical suppliers; Mg: Metal supply stores; Pb: Metal supply stores; Tm: Rare earth suppliers
steps: Hg: Specialty chemical suppliers; Mg: Metal supply stores; Pb: Metal supply stores; Tm: Rare earth suppliers
1. Measure out 10 g of Hg and 30 g of Mg using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 10 g of Hg and 30 g of Mg using a precision scale.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid material from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid material from the crucible.
